Package com.rift.coad.lib.security

Interface Summary
PrincipalContainer The generic principal container interface.
RoleHandler This interface is responsible for supplying methods to get role information.
 

Class Summary
Role The role object that contains the list principals.
RoleManager The role manager, responsible for managing all the role information used in coadunation.
SessionManager This object is responsible for managing the ThreadPermissionSession objects in memory.
ThreadPermissionSession This object stores the thread permissions for the current session.
ThreadsPermissionContainer This object contains all the thread permissions.
ThreadsPermissionContainerAccessor This object supplies access to the thread permission container.
UserSession The user object identifying a user to the security system.
Validator This security validator.
 

Exception Summary
AuthorizationException This exception is thrown when there is an Authorization related error.
SecurityException The exception gets generated when an error occurs with the security in coaduantion.
